name: Lina - Linux Network Administrator
short_description: Easy way to get information about Linux stations on a network. A daemon (linad) runs on the network stations, and the Sysadmin could easily list the online ones and connect via SSH or VNC, or manage CUPS configs. Available for Linux, Win, and MacOSX.
